---
title: Synthea synthetic data overview
---

::: callout-tip
## Key points

1.  Synthetic data is often the best way to provide training on using FHIR or for testing FHIR-related software.
2.  Synthea is an open source tool for generating synthetic clinical data in FHIR Resource instances.
3.  Synthetic Synthea data can be downloaded from https://synthea.mitre.org or generated locally
:::
